law.catch_line: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated....

text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Abuse" has the meaning stated in § 4-501(b)(1) of this title.

"Domestic violence" means abuse occurring between:
current or former spouses or cohabitants;
persons who have a child in common; or
persons currently or formerly involved in a dating relationship.
"Domestic violence program" is a program established in accordance with § 4-515 of this title.
"Local team" means the multidisciplinary and multiagency domestic violence fatality review team established for a county in accordance with this subtitle.
"Serious physical injury" has the meaning stated in § 3-201 of the Criminal Law Article.
